content: Add a brand new dimension to your next virtual reality experience by putting on these VRgluv interactive VR gloves. The gloves employ a tracking system built upon preexisting Oculus and Vive hardware so that you can utilize your hands in the virtual world.

Explore the underwater realm without being encumbered by bulky tanks by jumping into the water with this tankless diving gear. It’s small enough to take virtually anywhere, requires no refills, and lets you dive for up to 45 minutes at depths of 40 feet.

Measure the entire length of a soccer field with the push of a button using this bilateral laser distance measure. It can measure a maximum distance of 262 feet and comes with handy features like auto-calculating functions for area and volume.

titleEN: The Volume Button For Your Ears
content: Reduce noise-related stress in your life by drowning out unnecessary noise with the volume button for your ears. It fits comfortably inside your ear like an earbud headphone and gives you full control over the surrounding sounds that you let in.

Experience the unsurpassed comfort of customized footwear without spending a fortune by slipping into a pair of the world’s first custom fit sandals. A specialized app maps over 200 data points on each foot to ensure a perfect fit.

Avoid embarrassing bladder leaks by strengthening your weak pelvic floor using this entertaining trainer game. The device wirelessly connects to your smartphone and detects the force exerted when you squeeze your pelvic floor muscles to control the game.

Say goodbye to groggy mornings for good by using the sunrise smart pillow to gradually wake you up. The pillow comes outfitted with lighting strips that simulate the sunrise and can be adjusted from 5 to 30 minutes – giving you total control on how fast you wake up.

Get your little gamer into the world of electronics from an early age using this DIY game console kit. This open-source kit is easily customizable, powered by Arduino, and includes all the necessary electronic components needed to create fun games.

The Roofus carpentry tool is the game-changing invention designed for anything from carpentry to steel fabrication and roof plumbing. It features a movable ruler that you can position at any angle, allows for vertical and horizontal leveling, and much more.

This multi-position laptop desk is your ticket to working in total comfort. Whether you prefer to use your laptop sitting upright or laying on your bed, you can easily position it at the perfect angle while maintaining your mouse pad and beverage in an upright position.

Ensure the smoothest ride possible – even over bumpy terrain – by outfitting your bike with this bicycle seat shock absorber. This adjustable spring fits almost any bike on the market, absorbs shocks in three dimensions, and can handle as much as 485 lbs.

Slumber in total darkness by wearing this modular eye sleep mask before going to bed. It’s made from breathable cotton and features memory foam eye contours that conform to your face so that they’ll stay on even if you toss and turn all night.

Reduce bacteria, mold, and odor by drying yourself using these charcoal infused hygienic towels. While standard towels are a breeding ground for hundreds of bacteria, the charcoal powder infusion acts as a strong antibacterial to reduce harmful microbes.

Upgrade your everyday carry by swapping out your old pocket knife for the world’s smallest tactical knife. It features an all-back urban military design with a corrosion-resistant 440C stainless steel blade with a combination of a smooth and serrated edge.

Ensure motorists notice you on the road by gearing up with this motorcyclist’s brake light helmet. Apart from protecting your noggin, it features a built-in wireless LED brake light on the back of the helmet that requires no special wiring or connected apps to install.

This 20-in-1 convertible dress is the extremely versatile garment that can be transformed depending on your needs. It consists of a double-sided top part, skirt part, and a regulating cord that lets you quickly and easily alter the dress’s style.

Bring all your favorite old school gaming characters to life in splendid pixelated glory using these magnetic pixel construction blocks. Each tiny block comes equipped with a small but powerful magnet that you can use to mix and match.

This ultrathin smart laptop power bank does a lot more than charge your laptop. Measuring just 9mm thick – the size of a smartphone –  it houses a massive 20,000 mAh battery in addition to offering 1 TB of storage space, and provides a slew of additional ports.

Achieve that impossibly tucked-in shirt look all day long by using the NV:S shirt holder. This handy device allows your shirt to remain neatly tucked in – even when you make sudden movements or bend down to pick something up.

Look like the hippest blogger at Starbucks by writing your thrilling content using this retro Bluetooth keyboard. The keyboard allows for multi-device pairing, is compatible with various operating systems, and can be customized with key style and color.

Practice, play, and record your music virtually anywhere using these smartphone connected drum stick attachments. They easily fit over your wooden drumsticks and accurately replicate drum sounds when you tap them while also allowing you to record.

With worldwide news outlets mainly focusing on the bad, the Good News Only Newspaper aims to change that by only focusing on the positive. This feel-good read highlights people, ideas, and movements that are changing our planet for the better.

Quit fiddling with cones and kettles! PERK is the automated pourover coffee machine that serves up the perfect cup at the push of a button. This sophisticated appliance uses the principle of mechanical suspension to guarantee uniformity of saturation every time.

titleEN: Easy Open And Close Accordion Tent
content: Set up your campsite in record time by packing this easy open and close accordion tent. It features a strong aluminum tubing frame that serves as the sturdy exoskeleton for the wind resistant half dome shaped tent.

Stay on top of things while you’re on the road by equipping your car with this artificial intelligence co-driver device. This personal assistant lets you take calls, answer messages, listen to music, and helps guide you around town.

Kniterate, the digital knitting machine cuts out the middle man by allowing you to take the manufacturing process into your own hands. You’ll be able to design and manufacture everything from beanies, scarves, ties, sweaters, and even shoes.

Instantly convert your traditional bike into a spiffy electric model using this electric bicycle wheel. This 350 watt 15 pound wheel installs in just 60 seconds, features a range of 30 miles, and can reach a top speed of 20 miles per hour.

Supercharge your phone with a tablet sized display using this portable touchscreen display. Offering you the benefits of a tablet for a fraction of the price, it allows for wireless transmission from your smartphone to a massive tablet sized 10.1″ screen.

Record your outtings like never before by having this auto follow 4K nano drone hovering by your side. Small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, it comes with GPS, stunning 4K capabilities, precision vision positioning, and an interchangeable battery.

Carry a toolbox-worth of hex bits in the palm of your hand with this handy pocket sized EDC screwdriver. It features an incredibly durable frame of aerospace grade 5 titanium and a magnet push bar that securely stores 8 standard sized hex bits.

Experience an incredible auditory journey when you step inside the speaker orbs. These unique orbs are actual speakers you can walk into and enjoy your favorite music on a level you never thought possible – it’s just you and the brain melting  music.

Drink like there’s no tomorrow without arousing suspicion by walking around with the fake baby hidden drinking flask. Rather than let others see you for what you really are – a raging alcoholic – they’ll think you’re father of the year spending quality time with junior.

Enjoy the radiant glow of a full moon every single night by placing this levitating moon light in your bedroom. This 3D printed light gently hovers above its magnetic base to create the illusion it’s magically levitating as it emits a soft gentle glow.

Joto, the live drawing robot is designed to instantly turn pictures and messages on your phone’s screen into actual pen and ink drawings. Anything that you write or draw on your phone’s screen will be instantly sketched  by the robotic arm in real-time on the frame.

Take your level of craftsmanship up a notch by crafting with this all-metal 3D printer. It features a rock solid construction that’s made to last, a user-friendly design that’s great for beginners, and it functions as both a CNC carver and a laser engraver.

Challenge anyone in the world to a game of chess – even if they don’t have a board themselves – with this intelligent chess board. It allows you to square off against over 200,000 players from 20 different countries or play against the board’s A.I..

Sleep soundly during your next trip by bringing along the world’s best travel pillow. This machine washable pillow is lightweight, can be worn in multiple ways depending on your position, and comes with features like a privacy hood and cell phone pocket.

Build a variety of innovative gadgets from the comfort of home using this electronic building blocks platform. This programmable building blocks platform contains over 30 kinds of blocks that each perform different functions and can be combined into fun creations.

Keep your furry friend entertained when you’re not around by using the smart robotic pet sitter. It features a strong polycarbonate frame and is equipped with a wide-angle camera and built-in laser so that you can interact with your pet in real time using your phone.

Now you can track, analyze, and improve your game in real time thanks to this golf game tracking pad. The pad records stats like distance, shot dispersion, as well as putting – and it immediately transfers the information to your smartphone.

Power up your electronic devices no matter where you are by bringing along the MotherBox wireless charger. This portable device can juice up gadgets without any point of contact and can also charge multiple devices simultaneously.

Experience portable gaming like never before by strapping on Gameband, the smartwatch for gamers. It’s made with a top-shelf processesor, features a AMOLED stunning display, and a powerful battery that’ll last for extended gaming sessions.

This shape shifting chair is the ideal way to provide extra seating without taking up additional space in your home. It features an ingenious ergonomic fold down design that features an articulated aluminum body attached to a flexible slatted wood surface.

Grow fresh organic food year-round by installing this indoor vertical hydroponic garden in your home. This space-efficient garden features a state of the art hydroponic system that works in tandem with the included overhead LED for optimal growth.

Cut out the middleman and begin manufacturing straight from home using this digital vacuum former. This industrial strength device features simple one-handed operation, a built-in infrared probe for real time temperature, and a spacious 9″ x 12″ forming area.

The Wheel minimalist turntable makes it possible to enjoy the unrivaled sound of vinyl without needing a bulky record player. This simple and easy use turntable plays the bottom of the record and allows you to control all actions using just the center stick.

Fit everything you need for your upcoming trip without running short on luggage space by using these compression packing cubes. They employ a special zipper to flatten your belongings and offer two separate compartments designed for clean and dirty clothes.

Enhance your wine drinking experience by sipping your alcoholic grape juice from this wine glass mask. It’s outfitted with ventilation holes to improve airflow while you sip and is contoured to fit your face so that you can fully appreciate the wine’s robust aroma.

Ensure you stay in top form  – even while travelling – by exercising with this portable total body gym. It features a convenient bow shape that accommodates a wide array of exercises and employs SpiraFlex resistance technology to produce up to 25 lbs of resistance.

Sharing your artwork is easier than ever thanks to this tiny robot drawing arm. This little guy is a small internet connected drawing robot that mimics your motion on the screen and recreates it in real time using a pen and paper.

Duct tape just became obsolete! The Braeön thermoplastic ribbon is the revolutionary and extremely versatile material that’s as malleable as putty but as strong as steel after it molecularly fuses in a matter of seconds.

Make your next VR experience more immersive than ever before by strapping on this virtual reality gaming suit. This lightweight and sweat-proof suit features 16 unique haptic feedback zones that will let you feel the impact of every explosion and gunshot.

Be prepared for any situation that arises on the road by sticking this next generation smart emergency kit in your vehicle. This comprehensive kit includes everything from a first aid kit to a power bank that can be used to charge your phone or jump start your car.

Make your LEGO creations more complex than ever before when you pair them with these flexible building blocks. The pieces are 100% compatible with regular LEGO bricks and come with flexible tendons that let you bounce and bend your creations.

Make your collection of trolls great again by getting this Trump troll doll. Aside from his impeccable hairdo and orange tan, he comes equipped with his very own smartphone so that he can use his tiny hands to tweet and tell it like it is on Twitter.

Visualize time in a new and creative way with the levitating clock. Available in either a walnut or ash finish, the clock employs a series of magnetized tracks to make a small  metallic sphere hover above the wooden surface to mark the passage of time.

Shoot your firearm indoors without consequence by downloading this indoor shooting range app. The app works with a special laser bullet that functions like a snap cap so that you can safely shoot your firearm at a target without any damage to the gun or your walls.

Capture any moment in a flash using this cardboard vintage instant camera. Made entirely from cardboard, it employs zero electronics and lets you customize aspects like aperture and lens position so that you can capture pictures and instantly print them.

The Adjustable Bag is a multi-size, multi-function, collapsible bag. With 3 sizes and 12 configurations, its ingenious design can cater to your specific travel needs – so that it can be used for anything from a short weekend trip to a longer journey.

The intelligent turntable revolutionizes the game by spinning around the record instead of having the record spin around on it. It plays the record smoothly while still recreating classic analog sound with the crackles and pops iconic to vinyl.

The Grid is a colorful board game that creates beautiful patterns as you play. Based on the rules of dominoes, this challenging strategy game/puzzle hybrid uses hexagonal tiles that must be matched color and height-wise to win the game.

Add a professional and cinematic quality to everything you record by using this smartphone camera stabilizer. Weighing just one pound, this lightweight accessory accommodates a range of distinct phone sizes so you can capture incredible shake-free videos.

The beauty of the deep comes straight into your bedroom in the form of these alluring jellyfish aquariums. They feature a sleek contemporary design made of high-grade aquarium acrylic and are fitted with interior lights that give it an alluring glow.

Preparing a healthy meal is easier than ever when you use the 60 second salad maker. Simply pour the ingredients into the straining bowl, turn the bowl upside down, slice everything up, spin it, then flip the bowl right side up and enjoy!

Wet towels are breeding grounds for nasty smelling bacteria. The Onsen towel’s unique waffle weave design ensures bacteria will never grow by maximizing surface area exposure for quicker drying times and superior breathability.

Teach your kid how to draw like a professional sketch artist using this smart drawing projector. Simply take a picture, apply any of several filters using the app, and then the device will project the image down onto the paper so your kid masterfully trace it.

Bring a cool sci-fi flair to the way you tell time by strapping on this Nixie tube watch. It combines vintage Nixie tubes with modern tech to produce a visually stunning timepiece that’s available in either a grey or black casing.

Stop throwing away food! Now you can convert it to fresh fertilizer with this 24 hour food waste recycler. This app-enabled device features an ample 7-day capacity storage area, a HEPA/carbon filter, and produces ready-to-use fertilizer in as little as 24 hours.

Instantly bring Bluetooth capabilities to all of your audio devices using Jack – the Bluetooth wireless headphone adapter. It allows you to play your audio wirelessly and even lets you sync two Jacks with the push of a button so that they can receive audio from the same source.

Transport your audience to the middle of the action by strapping on this wearable 360 degree action camera. It provides stable filming when you’re on the move, shoots 4K quality video at 240 degrees wide-angle, and lets you create an immersive VR experience.

Count down the days until the next presidential inauguration with The Out Of The Office calendar. This 1,461 day tear-off calendar counts down the next four years while informing you of important dates for voting and registration.

Complement your favorite songs with a visually stimulating light show by using these audio responsive glowing headphones. Upon detecting the song’s beat, the headphone cables will begin to pulse to the rhythm of the song in bright neon colors.

Get a full body workout without cluttering up your home with a bunch of free weights by using this adjustable dumbbell/kettlebell weights instead. You can easily switch plates between the dumbbell and kettlebell or use the plates individually for complete versatility.

Preserve the freshness of your favorite craft beers by outfitting your home bar with this triple chamber beer growler tap. Three internal insulated temperature adjustable chambers keep your brew chilled in a dark environment that will prevent skunking.

Keep your restless hands busy throughout the workday by writing with the fidget pen. The pen’s unique stainless steel construction lets you spin, slide, twist, and transform the pen into a number of entertaining positions.

Fasten your kicks in record time by swapping out your old laces for these one handed quick typing shoelaces. Simply outfit your shoes with the specialized metallic tips at the top end of your kicks, and you’ll be able to quickly fasten the lace single-handedly.

Make bath time more enjoyable for both you and Rex by using this wearable pet sprayer and scrubber. The ergonomic design allows you to efficiently hold your dog down while you bathe him with a steady stream of water that you have complete control over.

titleEN: Zero Clean Up Cold Press Juicer
content: Enjoy the benefits of juicing in a convenient new way by using this zero clean up cold press juicer. Simply place your fruits or veggies into the included bag and the appliance will extract fresh juice through a press with roughly 8 pounds of force.

Make better skin care decisions by using this smartphone UV camera attachment which reveals in real time any developing sunspots, skin damage due to aging, and even advanced warning signs of health risks such as melanoma.

The Alpha shovel is a virtually indestructible all-season tool that’s constructed using T6 6061 aluminum with serrated teeth for breaking ice, and features a collapsible and telescoping shaft that is adjustable to accommodate nearly any user’s height.

Minidive is the mini scuba tank designed to let people of all skill levels breathe normally underwater for short periods of time. It can be refilled by the user, has a 3 meter depth capacity and provides up to 10 minutes of underwater breathing time.

Enjoy clean, crisp sound without cluttering your room with electronics by using these small transparent speakers. They feature a minimalist design composed of four hardened glass sides complemented by a sturdy aluminum frame.

Shine a whole new light on your makeup routine by performing it in front of this smart makeup mirror. It comes preloaded with intuitive lighting modes such as  natural sunlight, office light, or evening light so that you can apply your makeup accordingly.

Cut out those lousy good for nothing eye doctors – you’re smart enough to diagnose yourself! Simply place your eye over the miniscope and instantly receive spherical, cylindrical, and axis figures just like your optometrist would.

Perfect your ping pong game right at home by training with this smart table tennis robot. Compact enough to fit in your hand, this app-enabled bot lets you control everything from direction to spin, and even run drills so that you can hone your skills.

Make your children’s favorite stories come alive by using this bedtime story projector attached to your smartphone. This small and colorful attachment goes over your smartphone’s camera and utilizes the flash to project colored images on the bedroom wall.

Keep your feet warm and toasty on cold winter days by placing these wireless charging heated insoles inside your shoes before heading out. They’re ultra light, paper-thin, and can be remotely controlled through your smartphone.

The 2-in-1 hybrid bag and jacket is the travel essential that transforms to fit your changing needs. Made from lightweight and durable materials, the jacket features an ingenious design that lets you go from a stylish jacket to a handy messenger bag in mere seconds.

Enjoy a coffee house quality cold brew whenever the mood strikes by making it yourself using the Artic cold brew coffee system. It utilizes cold water to brew a rich artisanal styled drink with a smoother taste, with low acidity and a powerful energy boost.

Automating your existing horizontal curtains is simpler than ever using this smart sliding curtain conversion kit. It installs in minutes onto your existing curtains and wirelessly connects to your smartphone so that you can control the curtains with the swipe of your finger.

No matter where you are or what you need lit, The Big Ass Light Bar will ensure you have a ton of illumination. It features a water, dust, and chemical-resistant design, comes with 6 brightness settings, and lasts for 48 hours on a single charge.

Using this multimaterial and electronics 3D printer you’ll be able to create anything from flexible materials full of color to real functioning circuit boards! It’s compact and features a cartridge system that allows you to combine up to 6 materials at once.

Start an impromptu jam session nearly anywhere you go using this attachable/portable guitar amplifier. This compact 10-watt amp hooks up to the base of your ax and pairs with your smartphone to produce amazing sound and nearly unlimited effects.

Add a touch of retro flair to your living room with the MONO Lamp. This spherical lighting fixture hovers above a circular wooden base and features a colorful geometric design based on old television test patterns from yesteryear.

titleEN: The No Monthly Fee GPS Pet Tracker
content: Keep a watchful eye over your furry friend without breaking the bank by using this no monthly fee GPS pet tracker. It employs a high-precision GPS to accurately track your pet’s location in real time, relaying the information to your smartphone.

Add a slew of useful features to your laptop without breaking the bank with this MacBook Pro Thunderbolt 3 USB-C hub. It’s equipped with everything from a micro SD slot to an HDMI output and is designed to tap into 2 Thunderbolt ports for maximum bandwidth.

Improve your workflow in the kitchen with the ultimate cutting board. Apart from a  large cutting surface, it’s outfitted with slide out brackets designed to hold either your tablet or plastic and metallic containers that you can use for storage or waste disposal.

Become the best pitcher on the field by perfecting your throw with the smart baseball. With each pitch you throw, the baseball tracks 3D trajectory, speed, spin, location, and rotation axis so that you can easily view them on your phone in a 3D viewing simulation.

Sleep comfortably while you travel by making sure to pack this wrap-around neck pillow along for the journey. The ergonomic design provides total neck support so your head keeps from bobbing side to side when you doze off.

Remain nice and toasty when you venture outdoors by bringing along this portable battery-powered heated blanket. This water-resistant, machine washable  lightweight blanket heats up in seconds, and can be used as a handy power source for electronic devices.
